name: Discover Dansbury trail, Isle of Wight

ai.summary: Discover Dansbury Trail is a 10.1 km coastal hike around the Isle of Wight, offering sea views, cliffside sections and a moderate pace suitable for hikers with some experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily coastal path with a mix of chalky tracks, compacted soil and occasional wooden boardwalks. Expect uneven surfaces, exposed sections along the headland, and potential mud after rain. Tidal and weather conditions can affect footing.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide times and stay clear of unstable cliff edges. Weather along the coast can change rapidly; dress in layers and carry a waterproof layer. Wear sturdy footwear, bring a map or GPS, and have enough water and snacks. If hiking solo, inform someone of your route and expected finish time. Be mindful of strong winds on exposed sections.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots with good grip
Weather-appropriate clothing (layers) and a waterproof jacket
Map or GPS device; fully charged phone
Sun protection (hat and sunscreen) and, if needed, rain protection
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) offer milder weather and clearer coastal views. Summers can bring stronger winds along exposed sections; winter hikes are possible but require extra caution and preparation.

seo.meta_description: Embark on a 10.1 km coastal hike on the Isle of Wight. Discover Dansbury Trail combines sea views, varied terrain, and a moderate route for walkers with some experience.
